summary: This is an internal email chain from June 12, 2023, regarding an update on a referral concerning Leon Black. The sender relays that they are coordinating with the District Attorney of New York (DANY) regarding a minor victim and have communicated this to Jeanne Christensen. The email includes attached notes from conversations with counsel and prior correspondence.

persons.name: Jeanne Christensen
persons.context: The sender mentions relaying information to Jeanne Christensen regarding the deconfliction with DANY about a minor victim in the Leon Black referral.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: The email subject and content refer to an 'Additional HT Subject Referral' concerning Leon Black, indicating he is the subject of an inquiry or investigation.

connections.description: Jeanne Christensen is being updated about a referral concerning Leon Black, suggesting she is involved in or monitoring the legal/investigative matter related to him.

events.title: Update on Leon Black Referral
events.description: Internal communication regarding an update on a referral concerning Leon Black, noting deconfliction with DANY regarding a minor victim.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email update dated June 12, 2023, concerning a referral related to Leon Black.
It indicates coordination or 'deconfliction' with the District Attorney of New York (DANY) regarding a minor victim.
Jeanne Christensen is identified as a contact who has been informed about the situation.
